QuestData.Title: This Just Won't Do
QuestData.Description: The Zandalari here are very powerful, $c. They should not be underestimated. We cannot afford to ignore them as a threat simply because they do not wield swords.$b$bMore arrive every day, and with them centuries of magic knowledge. This threat must be dealt with, and quickly.$b$bAid us in clearing this area, $c. Perhaps we can even learn something from them in the process.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill any 8 Zandalari trolls within Conqueror's Terrace.
